item.title: Parking bay causes congestion, 8th October
item.description:
B4633 Gloucester Road, between junction with Libertus Road and pedestrian crossing (traffic lights). On-street parking bay causes congestion, especially at peak hours, resulting in large amounts of queuing traffic on Gloucester Road and Liberus Road. Traffic flow is much better when there are no vehicles parked at this location. There is short-term free parking ay the railway station - removing the on-street parking at this location would greatly improve traffic flow at peak times, reducing pollution in the process.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 259, Gloucester Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Glencairn Park Road - street "cleaning", 8th October
item.description:
The street "cleaner" has visited Glencairn Park Road this morning - photos show the mess left behind. All it seems to have done is move the muck from the gutter a few feet out into the road. Needs doing again, properly.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1a, Glencairn Park Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
